title: King Crimson - The Road To Red (2013) (21CD Box Set) [FLAC]
description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                       King Crimson - The Road To Red (2013)
           Live in the USA and Canada - April / May, June / July 1974
                  Studio Recordings, London, England, July 1974
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Artists: King Crimson
 Title: The Road To Red
 Genre: Progressive Rock, Art-Rock
 Label: Panegyric Records - KCCBX7
 Released: 2013
 Artists Country: the UK
 Source: CDDA
 Audio Codec: FLAC (.flac)
 Bitrate: lossless
 Format: images / .cues / logs / full artwork

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 Info:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 This box set contains 20 CDs of live material - the majority mixed 
 from multi-track tape or the band's stereo soundboard cassettes - 
 and a new stereo mix of 'Red', also on CD.  

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 CD listing:                                                                     
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 CD01 - Veteran Memorial Coliseum, Columbus, OH - April 28, 1974

 CD08 - Coliseum, Denver, CO - June 16, 1974
 CD09 - Performing Arts Centre, Milwaukee, WI - June 22, 1974
 CD10 - Aquinas College, Grand Rapids, MI - June 23, 1974
 CD11 - Massey Hall, Toronto, Ontario - June 24, 1974
 CD12 - Massey Hall, Toronto, Ontario - June 24, 1974
 CD13 - Convention Center, Quebec City, Quebec - June 25, 1974
 CD14 - Kennedy Centre, Washington, DC - June 27, 1974
 CD15 - Casino Arena, Asbury Park, NJ - June 28, 1974
 CD16 - Casino Arena, Asbury Park, NJ - June 28, 1974
